flawed_nl_solution:
Lisa took 10 x 3 = <<10*3=30>>30 photos of flowers.
She took 30 - 10 = <<30-10=20>>20 photos of the scenery.
So, Lisa took 10 + 30 + 20 = <<10+30+20=80>>80 photos this week.
Therefore, Lisa took 80 - 15 = <<80-15=65>>65 photos last weekend.
#### 65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
